item.description:
Find me under three shiny BLUE STAR-shaped Balloons in front of the BANDSHELL. NOTE: As some of us will be coming directly from Southington's "Little Big Band" on the Green... if traffic/parking @ Hubbard Park is a royal pain, we may simply park outside the Park and watch the Fireworks from "wherever". If you want to hook up with us, please email me your cell# so I can inform you of our location. - Rob P.


Before it get's dark at Southington's "LITTLE BIG BAND, Classic Big Band Hits on the town Green" ... we'll zip over the town line to see the Fireworks display at Meriden's Hubbard Park, just a few miles away!

We had a mixed group of @ 20 for the Manchester Fireworks display from multiple MeetUp groups , plus the "Single Event" - old and new friends coming together! C'mon New Haven County - meet new friends!

We'll also be gathering for East Hartford's "RiverFest" this coming Saturday, 07/07. See that posting.

Time of Fireworks is tentative.

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends

item.name: 2of2: FIREWORKS - Meriden's Hubbard Park
